name: Shanghai's Snowdoll Skirmish
description:
The little doll Shanghai is excited for the first snowfall of the winter. So much snow! Plenty enough to throw around... Time for a snowball fight!

Unfortunately, she may have gotten herself in a bit over her head in challenging her own maker, Alice Margatroid. Alice never comes unprepared to a battle-- even one waged with snow.

Help Shanghai strike down the Snowdoll ranks and win the day!

---------------------------------------------
Controls
---------------------------------------------
Aim - Hold LMB
Shoot - Release LMB
Press Shift to hold up your Shield.

Press ESC to access the pause menu.
---------------------------------------------

This game was developed for Touhou Game Jam 10. After the last Jam, I'd like to think I've got my footing a bit more. I'm really proud of this little game! I hope you enjoy it too. :)

Once again, HTML on Itch seems to hate Godot, so I'd recommend downloading it. Overall, it does work better than last time though... -RunicRhythm

Art/Animation - RunicRhythm
Programming - RunicRhythm
Design - RunicRhythm
SFX/Music - Yal, Saishoo
